goal.en: This course (TOEIC Test) is the first in a series of two, devised to develop students’ English proficiency in the general context of the workplace with a focus on five aspects of the language: vocabulary knowledge, grammar acquisition, listening competency, reading comprehension, and test-taking strategies. To be specific, it aims to advance students’ fundamentals and tactics required for TOEIC (Test of English for International Communication), which can officially certify their workplace English level and appreciably enhance their employment profile.

content.en:
**Click the following link for the one-whole-year program schedule and for the key difference between “TOEIC Alternative“ track and “TOEIC Test“ track: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1O7T4_wGA7Ws_kIL7VnSyIIGH5JjyF6uf. (Note: There is no pre-requisite to any of the courses offered by the program; students can take them in
order of preference.)
**Language acquisition takes time and effort on a regular basis.
**Our lessons and evaluations start from Week 1 for all students, the registered or the interested. If you can‘t make it, you can provide school approval for an excused absence or use our bonus scheme to make up for the loss.
**Class announcements will be posted on new ee-class in due course: https://ncueeclass.ncu.edu.tw/. Students are required to follow the announcements posted on there on a weekly basis.
(tentative weekly schedule)
Week 1 Orientation
Week 2 TOEIC Test Part 1: Photographs
Week 3 TOEIC Test Part 2: Question ＆ Response
Week 4 TOEIC Test Part 3: Conversations
Week 5 TOEIC Test Part 4: Talks
Week 6 TOEIC Test Part 5: Incomplete Sentences ＆ TOEIC Test Part 6: Text Completion (Parts of Speech + Tenses + Voice)
Week 7 TOEIC Test Part 5: Incomplete Sentences ＆ TOEIC Test Part 6: Text Completion (Agreement + Pronouns)
Week 8 TOEIC Test Part 7: Passages (Single Passages)
Week 9 Midterm Exam: TOEIC Listening ＆ Reading Test (2.5 hours, from 10:00~12:30, for 200 Multiple-choice Questions)
Week 10 TOEIC Test Part 5: Incomplete Sentences ＆ TOEIC Test Part 6: Text Completion (Infinitives and Gerunds)
Week 11 TOEIC Test Part 5: Incomplete Sentences ＆ TOEIC Test Part 6: Text Completion (Conjunctions and Prepositions + Relative Clauses + Conditionals)
Week 12 TOEIC Test Part 5: Incomplete Sentences ＆ TOEIC Test Part 6: Text Completion (Participles and Participle Clauses + Modification + Comparisons)
Week 13 TOEIC Test Part 7: Passages (Multiple Passages)
Week 14 TOEIC Test Part 1: Photographs ＆ TOEIC Test Part 3: Conversations
Week 15 TOEIC Test Part 2: Question ＆ Response ＆ TOEIC Test Part 4: Talks
Week 16 Final Exam: TOEIC Listening ＆ Reading Test (2.5 hours, from 10:00~12:30, for 200 Multiple-choice Questions)
